EmailTemplate.name: Account Request Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Subject Requesting Customer Account Set Up - AeroCRM
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TO: Honeywell Aerospace 'AeroCRM' Customer Master Team:
REQUESTER: Please fill in the new Account details in this email and send it to AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com. Update the appropriate record(s) in SFDC once you receive notification from AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com of the new Account.
This is a request to create a new account in SFDC. Details are noted below:
--- CUSTOMER ACCOUNT INFORMATION --- (R) Account Name: (O) Company website/URL: (R) Account Market: (R) Account Type: (R) Account Business Segment/CBT: (R) CBT Team: (R) Account Primary Phone Number: (O) Account Fax Number: (R) Street Address Line 1: (O) Street Address Line 2: (O) Street Address line 3: (R) City: (O) State: (O) Zip: (R) Country:
--- CUSTOMER CONTACT INFORMATION --- (R) Contact First Name: (R) Contact Middle Name: (R) Contact Last Name: (R) Street Address Line 1: (O) Street Address Line 2: (O) Street Address line 3: (R) City: (O) State: (O) Zip: (R) Country: (R) Work Phone Number: (O) Work Phone Extension: (O) Fax Number: (R) Primary Email Address: (O) Alternate Email Address:
Requester, please include any known additional information: i.e. Honeywell SAP Account Name, SAP Account ID, if customer has done prior business with Honeywell, any current internal Honeywell system references, contacts to help support faster setup and resolution of the request.
Note to AeroSFDCCustomerMaster@honeywell.com: Response to sender once the account resolution has been established is required.
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time. Honeywell - Confidential
